reviews.review_msg:
She has an amazing personality and you can go up to her for additional help. She's really approachable and she will stay with you until you get the material. 

However, in terms of time management, she has the worst time management skills ever. We have a big group project due on Monday just to have a big final exam 3 days later at 8:30am.
She was super nice. After a horrible experience with another teacher, I was grappling pillows when I looked at my GPA. But, she was super nice and lenient. Take the course, u wont regret it Ehe he.
